name: The Witch's Hour
description:
It's finals week, and you're stressed as shit. You decide to leave your room for the first time in hours, and, depending on your choices, make a life-altering journey.

This is a short interactive story! The game branches off into three major routes, letting you meet three unique witches. You can romance, befriend, or abandon these characters as you wish. Have fun and let me know what you think!
